description:
If you ever dreamed of starting your own business but don't know where to start, or have fears and barriers that are stopping you, then this course is a must watch for you.  We will guide you through steps that will set you up for financial freedom in year 1.

We will take you through a step by step guide from having a business idea to researching your idea and potential market place.  We will work with you to understand where your product fits in the market and look at who your target customer is and best practice ideas for reaching them via your sales and marketing activities.  Finally we will discuss how to keep and grow your customers.  

By the end of the course you will have the confidence to take the first steps and have a range of tools and templates to assist you in your journey.  This isn't a 'get rich quick' video but a pragmatic, step by step guide providing you with video coaching sessions, tools, templates and articles to help you research, test and launch your business.

Ian Laurie from Snow Digital Media commented "Rob has a no nonsense practical approach that cuts through the hype of starting your own business and gives you the tools and templates to move forward with confidence and focus."
title: How to start your own business & gain financial freedom
